name: Ensure IAM Users that are inactive for 30 days or more are deactivated
body:
IAM users who have not logged into AWS and have no API activity for 30 days should be considered inactive.

We recommend IAM users that are not active for 30 days or more have their accounts terminated.
remediationDescription: If you conclude that the users can be deleted, follow the [AWS Documentation](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/id_users_manage.html#id_users_deleting) describing the steps.
